title: game is dog
body:
damage too high

winning feels like shit because your team is statistically better than yours normally and its a stomp

losing feels like shit because their team is statistically better than yours normally and its a stomp

top lane is fucking useless

like nobody wants to play this shit dude its not fun

replies.body: If nobody wants to play this why are there millions playing the game currently?

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-08T05:11:38.478+0000)
>
> If nobody wants to play this why are there millions playing the game currently?

out of habbit they have nothing better to do

> [{quoted}](name=you dead lmao,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-02-08T05:14:18.465+0000)
>
> out of habbit they have nothing better to do

When MILLIONS of people have "nothing better to do" and are just "playing out of habit" you need a much better excuse than that.

TIL your personal opinions are definitely shared by everyone else.

Must be pretty young.

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-08T05:11:38.478+0000)
>
> If nobody wants to play this why are there millions playing the game currently?

Why are some others just not playing anymore?

> [{quoted}](name=G0blinSlay3r,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2020-02-08T05:21:18.615+0000)
>
> Why are some others just not playing anymore?

The same reason everyone stops playing games. People grow bored of them, just don't have time or something else got their attention among many, many other things. If you are implying that the only reason people stop playing games is because "they don't like it anymore" or because "the game is now bad" then I feel sorry for you. I used to play Ragnarok Online all the time and one day I just stopped since I didn't have time to keep playing it and my friends moved on to other games. You aren't going to be playing the same game forever, regardless of the quality of the game.

> [{quoted}](name=ZephyrDrake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2020-02-08T05:32:54.494+0000)
>
> The same reason everyone stops playing games. People grow bored of them, just don't have time or something else got their attention among many, many other things. If you are implying that the only reason people stop playing games is because "they don't like it anymore" or because "the game is now bad" then I feel sorry for you. I used to play Ragnarok Online all the time and one day I just stopped since I didn't have time to keep playing it and my friends moved on to other games. You aren't going to be playing the same game forever, regardless of the quality of the game.

And implying people don't get pissed off a good amount of the time and leave is a lie?

> [{quoted}](name=G0blinSlay3r,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2020-02-08T06:06:52.788+0000)
>
> And implying people don't get pissed off a good amount of the time and leave is a lie?

I never said that. I said that if the ONLY reason you think people stop playing games is that then that is simply not true. There are so many reasons why people stop playing games that focusing on one aspect of them dumb. Are there people who just hate the game and quit? yeah! there are people who love the game but can't play anymore due to life reasons.
Endorphin addiction aka mental high from wins.

> [{quoted}](name=Revech,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WP9z6Wew,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2020-02-08T06:46:15.512+0000)
>
> Endorphin addiction aka mental high from wins.

yeah MILLIONS of people are addicted by winning... do you have actual argument here?
When League is feelin bad, just play WC3 Refunded for a few minutes and your passion for LoL will instantly be rejuvinated.
